website_summaries.verdict: A durable bubble wrap roll for those who only occasionally ship or store items.
pros: Easy-to-tear perforations every 12” on the roll
Includes eight “Fragile” stickers to further protect delicate objects
cons: Some buyers complain that the roll length is too short

customer_reviews.title: Great for popping!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest here, I got this for my four year old who has some sensory/anxiety issues. I accidentally discovered that bubble wrap helped him calm down so I jumped on Amazon to order some. This works great for my purposes. The first sheet I pulled off I did need scissors to help because the perforation wasn’t great, but I haven’t had any problems since then. I would imagine it works great as packing material because the bubbles are firm.
customer_reviews.author: Kala F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for online sales and small items!
customer_reviews.text: The bubble wrap is perfect for what you pay for. It comes in medium-small, pre-cut layers some of which I have to cut in half for smaller items. I ship a lot of items and I haven’t gone through the whole roll yet. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: ChocoBerryBitters

customer_reviews.title: Good price and love the extra stickers
customer_reviews.text: It is bubble wrap. Protects what you ship out just fine. Bubbles make small pops when popped. Typical of these size bubbles. The fragile stickers are a great addition as I can now slap this sticker on the box and make it seem to my customers that we mean business. Overall pleased with the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: MREMC

customer_reviews.title: Strong bubble wrap with excellent divisions every foot
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles are strong and just what I needed to keep fragile things safe. It's super easy to tear off a foot at a time...perhaps a little too easy at times, as I did have it tear when I wanted a larger piece. Altogether, though, I would recommend this wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Kastner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish I'd ordered two or three! I was able to protect a valuable litho when we moved, and had very careless movers. No damage!
customer_reviews.author: ShanaB

customer_reviews.title: This does not have perforations for 12” sheets
customer_reviews.text: The description said easy tear 12” sheets but I just received a large roll of thin bubble wrap that didn’t have any perforations to tear. Was very disappointed because I was expecting 12” squares of bubble wrap. I could’ve went to dollar store and bought an unperforated roll!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G

customer_reviews.title: OK Bubble Wrap, tears at perforated lines easily.
customer_reviews.text: The perforated lines were really annoying. If you are using this with dishes and just want the 12"x12" squares, then look no further. I, on the other hand, was trying to wrap this around a TV and the bubble wrap but found it very challenging to keep it together. The sheets just tore apart so easily. They did put "Easy to Tear" in the title, and they are not lying.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Came in quite handy
customer_reviews.text: This bubble wrap and stickers came in handy for a package that I was shipping. I have little worry about the contents arriving at it's destination in one piece. I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sayya2daUPeh

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance but low value
customer_reviews.text: The perforated dispensing works great. Much of the bubble wrap sold here does not have a perforation cuts. This product is good. Includes fragile decal stickers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Just got a few stickers in this packafe-- e ough for one box. Bubble wrap is just 12x12, so unable to cut to a larger size. Fortunately I found a better deal on Amazon that includes much more wrap, much larger dimensions to accomodate all sizes, and the roll of stickers is so large that I'll have some left over..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Great for when I was packing up my dishes when we moved. I just wish I ordered more at the same time. I feel like a roll went very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend. Very thin and the perforation is so loose, when you wrap something, the individual sheets come apart at the seems. I had to tape sheets together to keep them from ripping. I found some wrap at the drugstore that was superior.
customer_reviews.author: ADM210

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I run a small business on the side where I have to ship items that often require bubble wrap for protection. This product has a great size dimension and a modest amount of bubble wrap for the price. The "fragile" stickers were a nice touch. I will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Contrell

customer_reviews.title: Bubblewrap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend. We both like the fact that you can actually just use a small amount or a larger amount and that it came with Fragile stickers. Great amount for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Martineau

customer_reviews.title: Mine did not include the Fragile Stickers.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, does the job it's supposed to, but this should be updated because there were no free fragile stickers with my order.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Small bubbles, lots of wrap.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this five stars but the actual bubbles are so small I feel like it barely does its job. The product did come with a lot on the roll so I was able to double-up the bubble wrap in order to keep my jars safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree & Ryan

customer_reviews.title: There are better wraps
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it's bubble wrap. All I want it to do is make sure stuff I wrap gets enough cushion that it doesn't break. It's hard to tell where the break to tear is, so you end up tearing more or less where you think it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Burmil

customer_reviews.title: It's BubbleWrap!?!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about it except that it arrived promptly and the free "fragile" labels were most appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: "Sam"

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not really impressed with this. The bubbles burst easily, a bit too delicate, not strong
customer_reviews.author: satyanam

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love how you get a lot of this bubble wrap and it's very durable. It's also super easy to tear off on the perforated edges. I sent a large glass cookie jar wrapped in this bubble wrap and it stayed in tact, according to the person who received it.
customer_reviews.author: Vibrant Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Good Bubblewrap
customer_reviews.text: Used this to deliver a package to safely take it to its destination, also its fun to pop and theres plenty of it. The stickers are helpful too
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle A.

customer_reviews.title: This was to thin.
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked it to be more thicker and more of it.
customer_reviews.author: mary e.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I needed. I am using the wrap for my 9oz soy candles. The wrap is easy to test but hand, the perfect size and came with fragile stickers which are great.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Watford Kwasikpui

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, JUST THE RIGHT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. I used it to pack Christmas cookies to ship from Arizona to Pennsylvania. It worked out very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Low value
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I should have looked at the measurements before purchasing this. That being said, I really though it was going to be a larger roll for the price. The upside is the ease of use. They’re pre cut in 12” segments and tear off easily and cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Make every penny worths!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for securing my package on shipping back the product back to the seller and I would say it worths buying for the reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hutabarat

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! For shipping/moving/selling
customer_reviews.text: This bubble wrap was SO perfect!!! It came in handy for so much. This sounds funny but it wasnt too much ‘bubble’ or too little. It was just enough to cover my items without too much bulk but enough to were it was cared for. Btw nice added touch with the stickers! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rawmen

customer_reviews.title: Great for who starting a shipping business.
customer_reviews.text: Very good size for the price. Just needed something to get me started and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: guidonin

customer_reviews.title: Didnt get any complaints with shipped item
customer_reviews.text: I used it to ship a few things i sold. Oddly enough it was packed with additional packing cusions...im really not sure why. But free bonus i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Everything as Promised
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as promised. I would do business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moving!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and kept all my items safe & intact during my cross country move.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: The size is not the same as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is not (3/16", 12" x 30 ft). Not worth the money, got it cheaper at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Husnain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting small items during shipping or storing...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wrap for protecting small items during shipping or storing... Easy to use, great value, fast ship.
customer_reviews.author: Matty C

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrapping dish, plates & delicates
customer_reviews.text: But remind that the amount is not enough for a house moving. Probably wanna get 2-3 if these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble wrap. Easy pull apart pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Great bubble wrap! Easy to detach perforated lines so you can use only the amount you need. Nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: bunnyannfox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my business
customer_reviews.text: The amount and price of the bubble cushioning wrap was just perfect for that little extra protection i need to pack my products. Im able to cut the right amount to wrap my products in and send it on its way with plenty to spare!! The easy tear sheets make it even easier. For the price given I am definitely going to stock up on more bubble wrap while i can!
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: It's bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.text: It's bubbly. It's cushy. It's a wrap. Functions as promised.
customer_reviews.author: NatureGirl

customer_reviews.title: maybe just good for wrapping
customer_reviews.text: I used similar products in Korea for winterizing the windows but this is only good for wrapping. It won't stick to the window even with water.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: I feel cheated
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate to write this review, but I ordered this in the rush of moving house, and I needed bubble wrap for some furniture and kitchen items. When a little roll came in, I couldn’t believe my eyes. I could barely wrap one item with it. I can’t believe I paid $8 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Visnja

customer_reviews.title: Stickers are great, bubble wrap-eh
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected but I do love the fragile stickers
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Foe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product !!!!! Great price !!!! Using it for my eBay sales for shipping. Outstanding product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Chevy729

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for shipping out products, as well as packing standard home items. I used for shipment of my products, and I also used it to wrap my glass house items during moving!
customer_reviews.author: A*********

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size/amount for $$
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the amount of bubble wrap for the amount of money I paid. Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Earwood-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Bubbly!
customer_reviews.text: Did what it’s supposed to - love bubble wrapping breakables to ship. This was perf!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to wrap framed photos. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: kfuller

customer_reviews.title: cushioned my fragile item just fine
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to wrap something fragile that needed cushioning. the fragile item is now cushioned
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage & mailing.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Keeps fragile items safe for storage or mailing.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a craft project, but could be used for packing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: There was a lot of it. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Bev from New Orleans

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than what I’m used to, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: This product is OK
customer_reviews.text: I’m not too happy with the product but I’ll definitely purchase it again just because I need it for my sells
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Used to protect fragile, valuable antique dolls in my carry-on bag coming home from UFDC convention.
customer_reviews.author: dolleyes1

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shipping a computer monitor to my husband and I love that it comes with Fragile stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works well I have not had anything break that I have shipped using this bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shehata

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of wrap for amount you pay
customer_reviews.text: I like how it comes with a few fragile warning stickers. You get a great amount of bubble wrap within this
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some bubble wrap quickly to mail a package. This roll also came with labels that say "FRAGILE" on them so that was a plus. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wray

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Too thin compared to the product I bought from an office store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Wrap as expected
customer_reviews.text: The bubble wrap was fine, just seemed kind of expensive for what is essentially just sheets of plastic with air trapped in little bubbles. But the price was comparable with other brands so I didn't subtract a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Loki

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Wrap
customer_reviews.text: It's bubble wrap, and did what bubble wrap is supposed to do. The 'Fragile' stickers came in handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Bubble Wrap for the price! Cheapest on amazon! Would definitely buy again. The fragile stickers are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward bubble wrap performance. The “fragile” labels are a nice extra touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Had been very helpful to have this when selling lots of clothing pieces. Nice size roll. It just keeps going and going. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: csiss

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It ran out too quickly. I thought it was enough but the roll isn't too large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its bubbly
customer_reviews.text: It's bubble wrap. The bubbles arrived unpopped. Just the product I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: B M C

customer_reviews.title: Thin but works!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thin but for the price does the job..
customer_reviews.author: Merry O.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packing with the fragile stickers. Saved on another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Aries

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size ! They are perforated for easy use !
customer_reviews.author: Tania L. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Am happy with my purchase. This is a big role and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Marks

customer_reviews.title: sheets are easily seperated
customer_reviews.text: Product was used to protect a young tree in winter, usually stands up to the elements for 3-4 years.
customer_reviews.author: puika

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: in used this for wrapping delicate items when I moved. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: bret spangenberg

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this for a gift for one of my kids because they like to pop the bubbles and they absolutely loved it LOL
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fun stuff. So easy to use. Loved that it would come off in sections.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Fink

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Bubble Wrap for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The bubble wrap is standard and serves its purpose, and you get a large amount for the price it is at.
customer_reviews.author: Markos Daget

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the perforated sheets. Great for my Etsy shop.
customer_reviews.author: J&C Amelio II

customer_reviews.title: Quality:A  amount:D
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but sure wasn't much bubble wrap for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Crizma2U

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bit a narrow but value is great. its okay to wrap small items.
customer_reviews.author: lino3388

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: Bubble wrap was perforated and worked great for my project
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price, well packed , just as shown on pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Eles

customer_reviews.title: what is a headline?
customer_reviews.text: bubble wrap was exactly what I needed for packing up our house
customer_reviews.author: bonnie ervin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Very easy to use and exactly said what they said it would be.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice that it comes in individual sheets. Very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but didnt received the FRAGIILE labels!
customer_reviews.text: The Labels were not included! Bubble wrap was OK. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Luis da Cunha Mondelo

customer_reviews.title: Responsible company!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with the product, it arrived way sooner than was expected. That was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff cheaper than in store and better quality 👍
customer_reviews.author: John Vernam

customer_reviews.title: PACKING SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: PACKING SUCKS, THIS HELPS IT SUCK LESS. IF ONLY YOU COULD TEACH THE MOVERS HOW TO READ AND COMPREHEND THE WORD "FRAGILE"
customer_reviews.author: Your Standard Reject

customer_reviews.title: Should not be on same day list
customer_reviews.text: These were on same day list and I was on a tight schedule. Took 2 days to arrive and missed my schedule so returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, good bubble wrap and added fragile stickers. My second purchase
customer_reviews.author: MerriM

customer_reviews.title: Easy p.  Roll is just right size for personal use.
customer_reviews.text: This bubble wrap is great for objects you want to protect. Perfect size for small items. Just the right size for personal wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: CFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion when shipping delicate items
customer_reviews.text: I make handmade jewelry & sun catchers this offers protection when mailed

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to wrap a delicate item for shipping. Excellent. Love the fragile stcikers

customer_reviews.title: You need more than you think
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for what is intended for but you will need more than you think

product_meta.title: Bubble Cushioning Wrap Roll for Packing (3/16", 12" x 30 ft), Easy-to-Tear 12" Sheets, Plus Free 8 'Fragiile, Handle with Care' Stickers
product_meta.description: Features 3/16" Height Small Size Bubbles; Easy Cross-Cut Tear: Perforated Every 12"; 30 ft Roll (30 ft Total Length, 12" Wide) PLUS 8 "Fragile - Handle With Care" Stickers; Perfect For Wrapping And Protecting Fragile Items; Reusable, Long-Lasting With Air-Tight Technology
feature_bullets: 30 ft Roll (30 ft Total Length, 12" Wide) PLUS 8 "Fragile - Handle With Care" Stickers
Perfect For Wrapping And Protecting Fragile Items

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars607 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
